titles.title: Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.
There is no way you can hold me down.
Stand back, O earth, I'm coming forth.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Stand back, O soul, I'm coming forth.
Stand back, O soul, I'm coming forth.
There is no way you can hold me down.
Stand back, O soul, I'm coming forth.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
This resurrection was sown a body that was natural,
And raised a body that is spiritual.
As we have borne this earthly image,
We will bear the heavenly.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Apártate tierra, yo brotaré.
Apártate tierra, yo brotaré.
Pues forma no hay para deternerme.
Apártate tierra, yo brotaré.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Apártate carne, etc.
Apártate diablo, etc.
Apártate mente, etc.
Apártate alma, etc.
